Key Match Events: Mexico scored a well-worked opener in the fifth minute through Orbelin Pineda
Mexico found a second goal in the 53rd minute through Cesar Huerta
Luis Romo sealed the result four minutes later
Post-Match Reflections: The All Whites have been outclassed by an impressive Mexico side
Darren Bazeley’s side were no match for El Tri on a sweltering evening in Pasadena
It was the All Whites’ seventh loss to Mexico in as many matches since 2000
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Central American side scored a well-worked opener in the fifth minute
Mexico had been unfortunate to hit the post before the break and struck the woodwork again in the second spell
A near full-strength team led by Chris Wood failed to manufacture any clear chances
